title: Famous Monsters Speak! (MP3 320kbps)
description:
Famous Monsters Speak!

These are the same stories that were first advertised and sold through Famous Monsters of Filmland.

Originally released in 1962 (and re-released in 1973), the albums are collectors items today.

Famous Monsters released a CD containing these stories back in the late 1990s, but they sounded like absolute garbage, obviously being mastered from a worn out album, and the cover art was blanched out and fuzzy.

I was able to locate some pristine CD versions which were mastered from the original tapes, but being marketed as some kiddie CD for Halloween with no indication on the CD release that these were the stories from the original FMS! album.

Please enjoy these stories, as they have never sounded better!
